matrix.adapterDistribution

Interface IDataShared

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataSharedJPPFImp

    public interface IDataShared
extends java.io.Serializable
    This interface provides a common protocol for sharing data across the cluster. Implementations of AdapterDistribution can be used for retrieving the appropriate implementation of this class.
    Author:
    Antonela Tommasel

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object getValue(java.lang.String key)
      Retrieves the shared object that is mapped to a particular key.
      void putValue(java.lang.String key, java.lang.Object value)
      Shares a object across the cluster and associates it to a key.

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        java.lang.Object getValue(java.lang.String key)
        Retrieves the shared object that is mapped to a particular key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key to the object to retrieve
        Returns:
        the retrieved object or null if the object does not exist

      • putValue

        void putValue(java.lang.String key,
            java.lang.Object value)
        Shares a object across the cluster and associates it to a key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the object to store
        value - the value to score
